channel.title: Welcom to My Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Welcom to My Blog

item.title: Build a Hugo Blog in Windows 10
item.description: Prepare the Environment Step 1. Install and Configure Github Visit https://git-scm.com/downloads and download Git. Install Git, all options are selected by default. Register Git account and configure Key. Please Baidu or Goole for detailed operation. Step 2. Install and Configure Hugo Download the Hugo Tool Visit https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases and download Git. Unzip the file package. Configure environment variables for hugo Click the local PC and right-click, click Properties.

item.title: Deploy the Blog to GitHub Pages
item.description: Step 1. Create Repository Log in to https://github.com. Click the “+” in the upper right corner and select New repository. Enter the domain name under Repository name xx.github.io For example: luluzhangmin.gothub.io Select the Public and Add a README file options, and click Create repository. Click Settings in the navigation bar, select the master branch under Source, and click Save.
